definitions.definition: A usually preliminary meeting of party members to nominate candidates for public office or delegates to be sent to a nominating convention, or to confer regarding policy .
A grouping of all the members of a legislature from the same party.
A political interest group by members of a legislative body.

main_definition: A usually preliminary meeting of party members to nominate candidates for public office or delegates to be sent to a nominating convention, or to confer regarding policy .
secondary_definitions: A grouping of all the members of a legislature from the same party.
A political interest group by members of a legislative body.
